effect.name: Pixs0r
effect.description: Glitch image shifting rows to and fro.
effect.author: Gephex crew

parameter.name: block_height
Block height
parameter.comment: Height of each block whose shift is invariant (0 = random)

parameter.name: block_height_min
Minimum block height
parameter.comment:
If Block height is 0 (random),
this determines the minimum block height.

parameter.name: block_height_max
Maximum block height
parameter.comment:
If Block height is 0 (random),
this determines the maximum block height.
